query:
SELECT 'DEPOIS DA LIMPEZA' as momento, NOW() as timestamp
UNION ALL
SELECT 'clientes', COUNT(*) FROM clientes
UNION ALL SELECT 'mercados_unicos', COUNT(*) FROM mercados_unicos
UNION ALL SELECT 'concorrentes', COUNT(*) FROM concorrentes
UNION ALL SELECT 'leads', COUNT(*) FROM leads
UNION ALL SELECT 'clientes_mercados', COUNT(*) FROM clientes_mercados
UNION ALL SELECT 'mercados_history', COUNT(*) FROM mercados_history
UNION ALL SELECT 'clientes_history', COUNT(*) FROM clientes_history
UNION ALL SELECT 'concorrentes_history', COUNT(*) FROM concorrentes_history
UNION ALL SELECT 'leads_history', COUNT(*) FROM leads_history
UNION ALL SELECT 'enrichment_runs', COUNT(*) FROM enrichment_runs;
